name: Badges and Bravado
description:
Welcome to Badges & Bravado, the hottest cop TV series of the 80s & 90s! 

The action-dramedy series about the officers of the Blue Bay Police Department. Each week they face a new threat to the city while dealing with their own interpersonal relationships. Tune in this week to see if they'll be able to save the day and finally prove the captain has been wrong about them this whole time… Now queue that sweet saxophone music and roll those opening credits!

Made with love and laser feelings By Tim & Kristin Devine
